title: BRAND detail page - connected CAR MODELS
user_story:
As a visitor\
On the BRAND detail page\
I want to see all CAR MODELs they have created\
So I can get an overview over their range of cars
description:
# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* the existing brand detail page is extended to display a prominent section for the connected car models
* this section contains:
  * a headline h2 describing the relationship
  * a list of all car models that are attached to the brand
  * a number with the amount of connected car models
  * each item links to the resp. car model
* the section is not shown when there are no car models attached to the brand

**Quality Gates**

* Behavior tests (Playwright) are extended
* Accessibility tests are extended
* Performance tests are extended
* Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* sort, pagination, filter, search within the list
